column1: Uchi////Uchi has always been our go to for those special evenings
column4: where we ordered take out (we would never do that
column7: we thoroughly enjoyed the food. We are vegetarians and Uchi has always amazed is with their evolving veg menu. Though got take out the selection was limited
column8: which I understand because they don't want to compromise on quality or experience. We could not order some of our favorites but shout out to Jessica
column9: who helped us with the selection and portions
column10: and made sure our experience was amazing.
